trends.name: Aura Aesthetic
trends.description: The 'aura' trend focuses on mysterious, ethereal vibes with dark academia influences. Think moody colors, vintage-inspired pieces, and an air of sophistication.
trends.marketing_angle: Emphasize mystery, sophistication, and timeless elegance. Use phrases like 'cultivate your aura', 'mysterious elegance', 'timeless sophistication'

trends.name: Quiet Luxury
trends.description: Minimalist, high-quality basics without logos. Focus on craftsmanship, premium materials, and understated elegance.
trends.marketing_angle: Highlight quality over quantity, craftsmanship, and investment-worthy pieces. Use 'quiet confidence', 'refined simplicity', 'investment piece'

trends.name: Dopamine Dressing
trends.description: Bold, bright colors and playful patterns that boost mood. Fun, energetic, and unapologetically vibrant.
trends.marketing_angle: Focus on mood-boosting, self-expression, and joy. Use 'boost your mood', 'express yourself', 'radiate positivity'

trends.name: Coastal Grandmother
trends.description: Relaxed, elegant coastal vibes inspired by Nancy Meyers films. Comfortable luxury with a breezy, effortless aesthetic.
trends.marketing_angle: Emphasize effortless elegance, comfort, and timeless coastal style. Use 'effortlessly chic', 'coastal elegance', 'relaxed luxury'

trends.name: Y2K Revival
trends.description: Early 2000s nostalgia with low-rise jeans, butterfly clips, and metallic fabrics. Bold, playful, and nostalgic.
trends.marketing_angle: Tap into nostalgia and the fun of the early 2000s. Use 'throwback vibes', 'iconic Y2K', 'retro glam'

trends.name: Gorpcore
trends.description: Outdoor and hiking-inspired fashion made stylish. Functional pieces that work for both trails and streets.
trends.marketing_angle: Blend adventure with style. Use 'trail to street', 'adventure ready', 'nature-inspired style'
